translation.intro-text: DA ServePro aplikasɔn bɛ dɛmɛ don butik dɔnbagɛw ani baarakɛlaw ma u ka faratiɲɛnajɛw ɲɛnabɔ ko la. Bɛ se ka sɔrɔ F&B, faratiɲɛnajɛ ani baara la.
translation.feature1-text: Interface dɔɔnin, sɔgɔsɔgɔninjɛw kɛ 3 sekondi kɔnɔ
translation.feature3-text: Sɔrɔko, sɔgɔsɔgɔninjɛ ani faratiɲɛnajɛ ɲumanw jatebɔ
translation.feature4-text: Baarakɛla kelen kelen ma ka baara dilan
translation.address: Adrɛsi: 52 D1 Dugu, Phuoc Long B, Thu Duc, Ho Chi Minh Dugu
translation.footer-text: © 2025 DA ServePro. Danfaraw bɛɛ sigilen don.
